strapiPost.title: Arkansas Women’s Basketball Opens 2022-23 Season At Pine Bluff Tonight
strapiPost.content:
Arkansas Women’s Basketball will face the UAPB Golden Lions tonight at 6p at H.O. Clemmons Arena in Pine Bluff. 

  • Firsts: This will be the first time an Arkansas Women’s Basketball team has ever played at UAPB, and the 4,100-person arena is sold out!
  • Rematch: Last year’s matchup with UAPB at Bud Walton resulted in a 96-63 win for the Lady Razorbacks, led by Wolfenbarger’s 15 points and seven rebounds. 

Find more information about the game HERE.
